topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c1687a6368722d1ef33b00#post_54c1687a6368722d1ef33b00
I'm glad Attack on Titan has at least a couple of characters like Sasha
!http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130605181027/shingeki-no-kyojin/es/images/3/30/Sasha_Braus_-_Anime.png!
Because god forbid a dramatic show can be lighthearted and have a sense of humor that doesn't come off as dark or morbid. So haters don't like her because she's annoying? Nobody except for the merchant and that one officer has legitimately pissed me off! Except maybe those [spoiler]slave traders who killed Mikasa's parents[/spoiler], but that was intentional to hate them.
